CHANGES
=======

0.3.0 (2018-01-12)
------------------

- Many many formatting fixes including an almost complete rewrite of
  list handling and list styles.


0.2.0 (2017-12-08)
------------------

- Cleaned up the public API.

- Added basic docs.


0.1.0 (2017-11-21)
------------------

- Basic Support for:

  * Flowables: para, blockTable, hr, ul, ol

  * Stylesheets: paraStyle

  * Page Layout

- Initial Release
